Document: # Follow the rules of escalation. Follow escalation rules against non-hostiles and don't murder someone for annoying you, use common sense. - You can defend yourself to the extent of protecting your own life, if the attacker is not a hostile force. - Military Police may use less-lethal force to effect arrests of criminals. - Don't outright leave people to die if you get in a fight, make an effort to heal them or bring them to Medbay if they are not a hostile force. - Adminhelp the situation if you think someone is over-escalating.
